doc.title: 26 Mirror: Montage of Lives
doc.plot: A tragic drama of six people in the same hotel room over time. Ryan, a washed up actor struggling to find himself. Rachel, a young woman dealing with teenage drama. Parker, a cop dealing with emotional trouble, and a failing marriage. Peter and Sarah, newlyweds trying to make ends meet. Sam, an artist at the end of his career working to find his final inspiration, secretly dying of cardio-pulmonary disease he's been hiding from his wife. These are the stories that make up 26 Mirror.
